AI agents with capability-based queries and reputation integration ERC-8004 Standard Features: - Agent registration with AgentCard metadata (IPFS URI) - Capability-based discovery (skills, services offered) - Wallet-to-agentId mapping for on-chain interactions - Verification and validation mechanisms - Cross-platform portability Security: - OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard - Signature verification for agent authorization - Access control for agent updates - CEI pattern throughout - Comprehensive event logging","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant returns.agentIds: Array of agentIds with this capability

returns.hasCapability: True if agent has the capability

registerAgent(uint8,string,string[]).details: Follows CEI pattern. Requires registration fee to prevent spam.      AgentId is derived from keccak256(owner, agentCardURI, timestamp)

params.agentCardURI: IPFS hash of AgentCard JSON metadata

returns.agentId: Unique identifier for the registered agent

updateAgent(bytes32,string,string[]).details: Only agent owner can update. Reindexes capabilities.

params.newAgentCardURI: New IPFS hash of AgentCard metadata

updateAgentStatus(bytes32,uint8).details: Only agent owner can change status

verifyAgent(bytes32).details: Verification provides trust signal for agent discovery

getActiveAgentsByCapability(string).notice: Get all active agents with a specific capability

getAgentByWallet(address).notice: Get agentId for a wallet address

getVerifiedAgentsByCapability(string).notice: Get all verified agents with a specific capability

hasCapability(bytes32,string).notice: Check if agent has a specific capability

registerAgent(uint8,string,string[]).notice: Register a new agent in the ERC-8004 registry

transferAgent(bytes32,address).notice: Transfer agent ownership to new wallet

verifier().notice: Verifier address (can mark agents as verified)

walletToAgent(address).notice: Mapping from wallet address to agentId
